reptilian_humanoid: The skin is entirely covered in intricate, layered scales in shades of olive green and earthy tan. Large, thick armored scales form a prominent ridge along the top of the elongated, bald head. The eyes are large and almond-shaped with piercing amber irises and vertical slit pupils. The nose consists of two subtle, snake-like slit nostrils on a flat facial plane. The mouth is a thin, straight, lipless line. Fine, delicate scales surround the eye sockets and mouth area
human: The skin is smooth, natural-looking, with subtle pores and fine lines, in a warm, realistic human skin tone. Short, dark hair. The eyes are human-shaped with piercing dark brown irises and round pupils. The nose is well-defined with realistic nostrils. The mouth is naturally shaped with subtle lips
ork: The skin is rough, green-tinged, with prominent scars and tribal markings. Heavy brow ridge. Coarse, dark hair. The eyes are human-shaped with piercing yellow irises and round pupils. The nose is broad, flat with flared nostrils. The mouth is large with prominent lower tusks protruding upwards
alien: The skin is smooth, iridescent grey with subtle bioluminescent patterns. The alien has large, almond-shaped black eyes and a streamlined head
elf: The skin is smooth, pale, and luminous, with delicate features. The elf has long, pointed ears and flowing silver hair that frames a face with piercing, intelligent emerald green eyes
dwarf: The skin is weathered, robust, and earthy-toned, with strong, determined features. The dwarf has a thick, intricately braided dark beard and rugged, dark hair. Deep-set, keen eyes with a resolute expression
troll: The skin is rough, warty, and moss-green or grey-toned, with a powerful, rugged build. The troll has a large, prominent nose, sharp tusks protruding from the lower jaw, and sparse, coarse hair. Deep-set, piercing eyes with a gruff expression
